basics.name: Ahmad Akilan
basics.label: Software Engineer | Backend | DevOps | Analytics
basics.summary: Software Engineer with eight years of professional experience. Through my career, I have worked on many fields and technologies including analytics, API development, DevOps, and a bit of frontend. My versatile skills helps me identify the right tool for the job. It helps me understand and connect with team members from different specialties. I am looking forward to applying my knowledge on software projects of a large scale and challenging nature.

work.name: Beno Technologies
work.description: Beno Technologies is a Dubai based startup company in the domain of rental cars
work.summary: I have helped in containing legacy version of the application, and then shift the application to a completely new direction based on Global Distribution Systems (GDS).
highlights: Designed system architecture and deployment landscape using Structurizr
Conducted code reviews for backend (Spring), frontend (Angular), and Android
Guided developers into improving coding practice with testing, mocking, and documenting
Migrated Infrastructure from Multiple AWS Regions to Bahrain Region
Maintained CICD pipelines, and AWS administration

work.name: ROAMWORKS
work.description: ROAMWORKS is a Dubai-Germany based company
work.summary: I have led the department during time of technology migration towards micro-services event-driven architecture.
highlights: Supported the development of micro-services through automation of builds, integration testing, deployment, and configuration
Developed IoT data ingestion micro-service using Spring Cloud Stream
Developed event driven micro-services that utilize Azure EventHub
Developed customizations and extensions for ThingsBoard
Wrapped legacy applications in Docker containers
Created bash scripts and Jenkins pipelines to automate micro-services deployment
Monitored applications using Azure Logs Analytics

work.name: ROAMWORKS
work.description: ROAMWORKS is a Dubai-Germany based company 15+ years company in the field of M2M and IoT. They are solution provider for large entities such as DEWA, and Emirates
work.summary: I was tasked to replace legacy analytics stack with a new open source based stack. The new analytics stack was successfully applied deployments across the landscape. The new stack allowed analytics for more than 2000 vehicles.
highlights: Created powershell scripts to automate SSRS deployments
Developed a new custom web portal for reports on top of SSRS's reports portal
Used ELK to optimize Database and ETL performance
Developed complex BI reports with complex SQL
Developed a large data warehouse for fleet management IoT analytics

work.name: Fujitsu
work.description: Fujitsu is one of the largest technology providers in Japan and worldwide. Their profile ranges from hardware to IT services.
work.summary: I have delivered a large enterprise implementation project of SAP Analytics and SAP EPM suits
highlights: Designed, implemented, and manged code customization for SAP Performance Management
Assisted in re-engineering business processes
Integrated SAP Solutions with MS Office
Integrated SAP Analytics with MS Active Directory Kerberos
Managed software components life cycle with SAP Analytics LCM
Maintained DB schema design and migration changes for Oracle DB
Integration SAP Analytics with HP Monitoring

work.name: MBC
work.description: MBC is the most popular tv channel in the middle east. The group holds many other tv channels, production companies and streaming services.
work.summary: I have worked on migrating micro-sites from old CMS to new CMS.
highlights: Developed frontend websites with plain HTML and CSS
UI test automation using SeleniumHQ tools

projects.name: Intro to application packaging in K8, Helm, Kustomize and Ship
projects.description: I have presented a remote session during the COVID-19 lockdown hosted by Dubai Cloud Native Apps meetup group. The session touched on several application packaging tools for k8s. It included both theory slides and coding demos.
